roleset.name: contraction of the diaphragm
roleset.note: HICCUP-V NOTES: Corrected by Claire. (from hiccup.01-v)

role.descr: cognate object, thing expelled, usually only mentioned when weird

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He hiccupped the bird, the feather caught in his throat.
example.arg: the feather caught in his throat
